content.rendered:
Happy 2022 to all of our customers around the world.  It is a privilege to serve you over the last decade for all your UPC barcode needs.  As of the 1st of January, we’ve now changed our name and website to UPCs.com.  Our service, products, and barcodes will all remain the same aside from the name change.  All previous links, downloads, your account, and buying options will work as before and snapupc.com will now redirect to UPCs.com.

Thanks for being a valued customer.  If you have any feedback to make our service better, don’t hesitate to contact us.

All the best in 2022!
